${ModID}:AstralFracture.NAME: Astral Fracture
${ModID}:AstralFracture.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : 消耗 一张牌。

${ModID}:Cognition.NAME: Cognition
${ModID}:Cognition.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Scry !M! before drawing.

${ModID}:EternalStrike.NAME: Eternal Strike
${ModID}:EternalStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this card is 消耗ed, add a copy of it to your hand with !M! more damage.

${ModID}:FalseGrit.NAME: False Grit
${ModID}:FalseGrit.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 !M! cards. NL 获得 !B! Block for each card 消耗ed. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : 消耗 !M! more cards.

${ModID}:HeatEngine.NAME: Heat Engine
${ModID}:HeatEngine.DESCRIPTION: 每当 一张牌 with a cost of 2 or greater, including ${ModID}:Amplify, is 消耗ed, 获得 !M! 点 力量 。

${ModID}:Recall.NAME: Recall
${ModID}:Recall.DESCRIPTION: 每当 一张牌 is ${ModID}:Amplified, put 一张牌 from your 消耗 pile into your hand.

${ModID}:RefractEnergy.NAME: Refract Energy
${ModID}:RefractEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Reduce this card's cost by 1 本场战斗.

${ModID}:RopeTrick.NAME: Rope Trick
${ModID}:RopeTrick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:Subspace.NAME: Subspace
${ModID}:Subspace.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 生命 equal to their ${ModID}:Distortion. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Subspace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 生命 equal to !M! times their ${ModID}:Distortion. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:SubtleKnife.NAME: Subtle Knife
${ModID}:SubtleKnife.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : 消耗, then add a copy of this to your 弃牌堆.
